Based power analysis , 256 subject need 80 % power detect medium size effect primary outcome . Accounting 20 % attrition rate , 320 subject recruit . The analysis include : ) pair t-tests determine change time ( pre-intervention post-intervention ) outcome variable ( sunscreen use burning ) separately 4 intervention group , b ) Repeated Measures Analysis Variance ( RM-ANOVA ) compare change outcomes across 4 group , c ) t-tests change score follow-ups RM-ANOVA determine exactly group differ .
